Question.Subject: I need a new browser that has very simple/easily workable bookmarks; are there any?
Question.Content: I was using Flock, but when I upgraded, I was horrified to discover that I simply cannot even use their new bookmark system. I already tried Firefox, and it's very similar to Flock.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I use google chrome. They give you an option to put them on your top bar which you can easily colapse and restore, or a list you can open from a button on the top right.
I ONLY use chrome now. I love it.
Its also way faster than the rest!

Answer.Content:
Google Chrome is a web browser that runs web pages and applications with lightning speed
Quick to start up from your desktop Loads web pages in a snap Runs web applications faster than ever

I use google chrome. They give you an option to put them on your top bar which you can easily colapse and restore, or a list you can open from a button on the top right.
I ONLY use chrome now. I love it.
Its also way faster than the rest!
